tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt: 35th qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: Made limited starts in the eGolf Tour in 2010, 2011 and 2012. Has played on the NGA Hooters Tour since 2007. 2012: Earned conditional status for 2013 Web.com Tour after placing T118 at the PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament...Played in two events on the eGolf Tour, missing the cut at the Grand Harbor Open and finishing T40 at the Columbia Open. 2011: Earned his third NGA Hooters Tour title, winning his second career Brunswick Plantation Open to go with the first title he won in 2009. 2010: Won on the NGA Hooters Tour for a second consecutive season, picking up a victory at the Columbia Open. 2009: Won the Brunswick Plantation Open on the NGA Hooters Tour.
tourBios.personal: Brother Jordan is an Army Ranger...Earliest golf memory is beating his brother for the first time...Follows the Cincinnati Reds, Ohio State Buckeyes and Clemson Tigers...Not many people know he is obsessed with beef jerky...A superstition he has is that he always carries one tee in his right pocket...Never travels without Q-Tips...Enjoys fishing and hiking...Lists his biggest thrill outside of golf is seeing the Grand Canyon. Favorite website is tigernet.com...Bucket list items include traveling to all the continents...Favorite quote is "Willpower outperforms."...Biggest thrill in golf is having the opportunity to play at Augusta National GC.
